title: [Self-Directed] Strategies for Enhancing E-Learning Service Quality Based on Customer Requirements

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental IT skills and job-related scientific knowledge
context.additional_context: A course for working professionals to efficiently learn science content with high job relevance in mobile environments and strengthen practical skills for improving service quality.

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three core customer requirements (CRs) for evaluating e-learning service quality.
Learners can set quality improvement priorities in mobile microlearning environments based on a QFD matrix.
Learners can analyze collected survey data using RST techniques to derive key influencing factors by reducing them by 20%.

resources: Data Analysis Tools (Excel or Open-Source R/Python Libraries)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
